title: forge版本启动崩溃
author: 伊吹_萃香
txt_content:
如题，java正常，纯净版可以启动，内存足够，但只要加forge就会奔溃。

日志如下（非常简短）


[21:29:58] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:29:58] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:29:58] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/google/common/collect/Lists
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.acceptOptions(FMLTweaker.java:50)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:114)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.google.common.collect.Lists
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        ... 3 more





logs中生成2个TXT文件


第一个 fml-junk-earlystartup

[21:28:19] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:28:19] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:28:19] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:29:58] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:29:58] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:29:58] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker





第二个 latest，是空的。

感激不尽。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
伊吹_萃香 发表于 2020-1-31 10:41
解决了，已经可以启动了。
最后，forge下载界面是下载
Installer 还是  Installer-win  或者  Universal  ...
Installer 和 Installer-win 都可以。Universal 下了你大概也不会用吧。。

没其他问题的话，可以点下右下角的最佳

replies.author: 伊吹_萃香
replies.txt_content: forge是按照常规正常方法安装的

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
下载我这个文件，解压，覆盖/替换你的 libraries 文件夹
https://c-t.work/s/6f495297f81244

(使用：HMCL启动器)

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
伊吹_萃香 发表于 2020-1-30 21:41
启动失败：未能解压本地游戏库。
java.util.zip.ZipException:zip END header not found.
直接用整合包吧
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=869469

明天我再试试总之谢谢大佬
